name: Theodore Osborne
text: Ordered my pizza and went to pick it up. The guy said its not going to be ready for another hour and walked out the store. I could not believe it. I was the only person left standing in the store. No other employee were there. I couldn't even cancel my order.

name: Kristine Rice
text: This pizza hut had a wonderful staff member, Asha (I believe), but she was working completely ALONE. She deserves a raise and paid vacation for how well she handled business. She was overwhelmed, but from her demeanor, you would never know. She did a wonderful job, despite the circumstances. Would recommend her, but not this location.

name: Shashi Kumar
text: Their phone doesn't work. I had to go all the way there  to order to go. I spoke with staff about the disconnected phone and he was reluctant to acknowledge. And I have escalate it to manager,  she was partially helpful. Finally I had to ask the manager check line connection.

name: Raj Roomsearch
text: It was worst experience here with my recent pizza pickup. I have not written bad review for any one before but the incident happen this time force me to write this true and long review. The person who was at counter was very rude. We â€¦More

text: I spent $35 on a pizza I couldn't eat. I ordered two pepperoni pizzas with black olives extra cheese. I couldn't eat but a few slices because the red sauce left and after taste in my mouth on both  pizzas.I don't know if the red Sox was left out overnight but it was a bitter nasty taste will you take a bite of the pizza

text: For weeks now I have tried to order delivery and been told they have no drivers.  The last time i got a delivery it was 30 min late and the driver tried to blame me saying i had the delivery address wrong.  I showed her the email showing my â€¦More

text: I ordered fries and wings here, and the fries were brown and mush inside. They tasted awful, and the wings were soggy. I ate two bites and called it quits. I believe the fries and wings were very old...

text: I've ordered from this place twice ... Twice they've failed to deliver. Half the time they never answer the phone.

name: Courtney J
text: Never ever have a delivery driver! I cannot always leave work for lunch, and I am a Pizza Hut lover but this location never has a driver for  delivery. Maybe I am just unlucky, and every time I order their driver decides to not show up.

name: Lori Sargent

name: Dana Lightfoot
text: I placed a carry out order and the manager, Kayla, was very friendly. Great food and great customer service. Would totally recommend!

text: Placed a lunch order at 11:30 and was told my order would be ready at 12:10. Ended up calling at 1 to cancel the order because my order was never delivered. I suppose I shouldâ€™ve read the reviews for this store before ordering.

text: If I could give them a negative star, I would. First, I'm from out of town staying in a hotel, when I  called for delivery the person who answered asked for the address, when I told him that I was at the Red Roof Inn he said he still needed â€¦More

text: i've tried ordering from here a few times through the pizza hut app, after most of the orders i get a call saying they have no drivers and i need to cancel or pick it up. i've canceled each time. the one time they did have a driver the pizza took longer then expected and wasn't made well. I am done giving this location chances
